title: Today's Patch
body: Why does the game suddenly look so ugly? Was this supposed to be an improvement? Because it looks like something from the 90's now.

replies.body:
TBH, they might be trying to fix the poor optimisation issue (random games will drop to 5-20 FPS even on high end rigs) they were having since the pre-season patches.

But yeah it kinda does look ugly and out of place.
